long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Its a fun extension named Hodor, which is made for relaxation purpose. 
On invocation, it replaces the all words in webpage to "Hodor".
Basically its text-replacement extension, specially made for Game of Thrones fans.
On next click of extension button, it refreshes page to show normal webpage content.
